clues.text:
In a letter to Marlon Brando:
"I'm praying that you'll buy 'On the Road' and make a movie of it"

To wife Zelda in 1930:
"If I have failed you is it just barely possible that you have failed me"

To a kind critic:
"I'm not like my characters, given to vapors and swooning and 'states', but I was... in a 'state"'

Ray Bradbury to this "Stranger in a Strange Land" author:
"Your influence on us all... cannot be measured"

To Frank Lloyd Wright:
"I would like to tell you now that Howard Roark represents my conception of man as God"
A 2013 cruise off Malta alerted Christopher Catrambone to the plight of migrants in this sea; now he rescues them
The German inscription on his grave in Jerusalem reads, "The unforgettable rescuer of 1200 persecuted Jews"
In 2007 this Middle East country's Queen Rania became UNICEF's 1st Eminent Advocate for Children

From the zesty Italian tongue cometh this word for a large, plush residence; someday methinks it will have its own pants
Good news! No longer need we say "shedding its leaves at the end of its growing season"--herewith a word for that
Born June 18, under this sign?  Don't let your dual nature make you vacillate
Like this fire sign, today you'll be ram-tough against your troubles
Halloween baby, beware the sting of this water sign; you may sabotage a deal today, but just say that's your nature
OK, this water sign is feeling crabby.  Being ruled by the moon isn't easy, so lighten up!
Changes abound for this mutable earth sign; perhaps you'll be touched for the very first time
